climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Soften Sensitive Skin: Dermatologist tested and hypoallergenic for sensitive skin
Gently Cleanse Skin: A perfect blend of creamy ingredients like shea butter, delicate chamomile and creamy buttermilk, combine to help cleanse and leave skin feeling soft and beautiful
Rich Aromatic Lather: soothing essence of Roman chamomile oil rounded out with delicate scents of powder and milk

Natural Ingredients: Our botanical ingredients and essential oils help take your skin, and mind, to the next level of refreshing relaxation. Yardley London Moisturizing Bath Bar soaps are free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate and cruelty-free
Since 1770: Yardley bath bars have stood as a symbol of English luxury since 1770; That tradition continues today with bath soaps that offer the best shower and bath experience inspired by nature
body.description: For the most up to date information, we recommend you visit the manufacturer website for the best product details, including ingredients, hazards, directions and warnings. This product offering is for 1 Retail Package

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yardley London English Lavender Bar Soap Yardley London Oatmeal & Almond Bar Soap Yardley London Activated Charcoal Bar Soap Yardley London Shea Buttermilk Bar Soap Yardley London Creamy Coconut Bar Soap Yardley London Aloe & Avocado Bar Soap Key Benefits Calms and soothes Helps soothe dry skin and gently exfoliates Helps purify skin Gently cleanses sensitive skin Smooths and hydrates skin Nourishes and conditions skin Special Ingredients Pure lavender extracts and essential oils Natural oatmeal Activated charcoal and bentonite clay Shea butter, delicate chamomile, and creamy buttermilk Shea butter, aloe, and vitamin E Aloe, creamy avocado, and olive extracts Fragrance Notes A perfectly balanced bouquet of lavender, fresh herbs, and spearmint A composition of crushed almond and sun warmed oatmeal, complemented with notes of vanilla bean and lemon zest Refreshing notes of spearmint and bergamot Soothing essence of Roman chamomile rounded out with delicate scents of powder and milk A warm, luscious coconut scent with a hint of vanilla flower Rejuvenating lemon and citrus notes harmonize perfectly with lively green notes Free From Parabens and Sodium Lauryl Sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Free from parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate Not Tested on Animals Not tested on animals Not tested on animals Not tested on animals Not tested on animals Not tested on animals Not tested on animals Made in USA Made in USA Made in USA Made in USA Made in USA Made in USA Made in USA 100% Recyclable Packaging 100% recyclable packaging 100% recyclable packaging 100% recyclable packaging 100% recyclable packaging 100% recyclable packaging 100% recyclable packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fragrant lovely bar soap!
reviews.reviewText: I love the creamy feel and the great fragrance of this easy to hold bar soap! Such low pricing makes it a no Brainerd to have delivered every month!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Skin's Nourishing Secret Weapon
reviews.reviewText: I have discovered a hidden gem in the Yardley London Shea Buttermilk Sensitive Skin Bath Bar! This daily skincare essential has become my little secret for healthy, glowing skin, and I can't keep it to myself.What sets this bath bar apart is its magical blend of shea butter and buttermilk. The combination is pure bliss for my skin, delivering a luxurious, moisturizing experience that leaves me feeling pampered and refreshed. The gentle lather cleanses without stripping away essential moisture, and the natural ingredients soothe my sensitive skin.I also love the unique size and shape of this soap. The 4-ounce bar fits perfectly in my hand, and its creamy texture glides effortlessly over my skin, transforming my shower into a spa-like indulgence.The Yardley London Shea Buttermilk Bath Bar truly stands out from the crowd. Its affordable price and exceptional quality make it a must-have for anyone seeking a unique and effective skincare solution. Say goodbye to dull, dry skin and say hello to a radiant complexion with this nourishing secret weapon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product smells sooo good and leaves me skin soft ! they also sell them at dollar tree too so if you don’t wanna wait for shipping you can get it there too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yardley London Bath Bar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great feel and smell. Not drying to my skin which is very sensitive to perfumes and heavy product. Never left a residue on my skin or tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and very soft on the skin . No sensitivity issues . Moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells nice and is great for my face only. I have sensitive skin. No lather for shaving legs and burns like …. If you use in the private area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: A little pricey, but other than that, it is great
reviews.reviewText: Tallow based soap, with shea butter and buttermilk. Very creamy lather, and nice and soft perfume. The only drawback is the price.
